name: breach-marketplace
description: Security-focused plugin marketplace for Claude Code. Tools for vulnerability hunting, security review, and bug bounty workflows.

plugins.name: breach
plugins.description: Security vulnerability hunting toolkit. Eight-skill pipeline with finding lifecycle for expert bug hunters: source code reconnaissance with threat modeling and git history analysis, automated static scanning (Semgrep + CodeQL), systematic code analysis, canonical finding structure and PoC standards, finding validation with anti-hallucination gates and triager analysis, vulnerability chain discovery, human-verified reporting, and pipeline orchestration.

plugins.description: HackerOne bug bounty platform integration. Navigate programs, reports, hacktivity, and earnings via the HackerOne Hacker API.
